summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackELEMIS Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 is clinically shown to deliver rapid hydration and restore visible firmness with added sun protection.
details: DetailsBenefitsGreat for: Visible Signs of Aging, Dryness, Dullness, WrinklesHelps to: Reduce Lines and Wrinkles, Hydrate, SmoothNo sunscreen feel: Lightweight gel-cream texture deeply hydrates without leaving a greasy residueNo sunscreen scent: Infused with rose and mimosa for a delicate floral aroma that delights the sensesDaily defense: Protects skin from future signs of UV-induced aging with SPF 30Key IngredientsPadina Pavonica: rich in polysaccharides that quenches skin with moisture for a visibly radiant complexionChlorella: soothes and hydrates skin while protecting it from environmental stressorsGinkgo Biloba: helps protect the skin from everyday stressors that cause premature signs of agingResearch ResultsIncreases hydration by up to 253% in 1 hour*Clinically proven to deliver instant and 24-hour hydration*Clinically proven to significantly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in 14 days**100% agreed fine lines and wrinkles appeared dramatically reduced****Independent Clinical Trial 2016, results based on 15 people over 24 hours.**Independent Clinical Trial 2016, results based on 30.***Independent User Trials 2016. Results based on 30 people over 4 weeks.Item 2545254How To UseUse daily in the morning after cleansing. Scoop cream and warm between palms. Massage onto face, neck, and d√©collet√© in upward strokes.Precautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 1.0%, Octionoxate 1.0%, Octocrylene 0.5%.Inactive: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Isononyl Isononanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dimethicone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylate-13, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Octocrylene, Stearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, CocoCaprylate, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Polyisobutene, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Citric Acid, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Benzyl Benzoate, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use daily in the morning after cleansing. Scoop cream and warm between palms. Massage onto face, neck, and d√©collet√© in upward strokes.Precautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor.
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel Oil

reviews.headline: Great day dream
reviews.comments: Gorgeous day cream. For reference, I am 31 years old with combo skin, leaning towards the dry end. I have some light wrinkles. While I can't say this did much for my wrinkles, it made my skin look plump and supple for sure. Very hydrating and rich, and the SPF is a huge added bonus. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: A must have!
reviews.comments: I've been using the ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF for a few weeks, and I'm genuinely impressed. My skin feels firmer, smoother, and hydrated all day long, and it gives a silky satin finish that makes makeup glide on effortlessly. I love that it combines anti-aging benefits with SPF protection, so I feel like I'm taking care of wrinkles while shielding my skin from the sun. The subtle rose and mimosa scent is a lovely touch, and the texture is lightweight, never greasy. I've noticed my fine lines looking softer, and my skin feels plump and nourished. Definitely one of the best anti-aging moisturizers I've tried! Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: I would keep buying it over and over again
reviews.comments: This is the second time I buy it . I really like it and the price is very reasonable. I like how it feels on my fat.

reviews.headline: Yes Please
reviews.comments: Elemis graciously gifted me this product. I love Elemis and have loved everything that I have received from them. One of my favorite face cream but with spf in it ‚Ä¶yes please!!Get as much spf out of your products that you can. Definitely recommend!!!

reviews.headline: Hydrated smooth skin
reviews.comments: Big fan of the Pro Collagen Moisturizer, so when I saw this SPF ran to get it. Very similar formula, very hydrating and fast absorbing, which is a must on tropical weather. The only thing I don't love is the packaging; a pump or a tube would be best, as that way is easier to apply without touching the rest of the formula. Gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: Light, moisturizing SPF!
reviews.comments: Expensive but worth it! It absorbs beautifully and doesn't have a greasy feeling. I have normal, acne prone skin so I use retinol at night. The SPF is a perfect bonus to protect and hydrate my skin at the same time. Light and pleasant sent! Gifted by elemis for my honest opinion.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by Elemis but it has truly been really great to use. I use this in the daytime and I've been using it for over a week now and really have been enjoying it. It doesn't irritate my skin and gives a nice glow.

reviews.headline: Awesome cream with SPF 30!
reviews.comments:
Im 56 year old and have dry sensitive skin.
I really love this moisturizer it doesn't break me and it leaves my skin feeling really good. I always struggle finding a SPF that doesn't break me out and this one didn't. 
It has no smell and it isn't sticky either.  And best best part it has SPF 30!
gifted by

reviews.headline: Great cream
reviews.comments: This is a great moisturizer! It is very light on the skin and hydrates well. The SPF 30 included is also nice because sunscreen often hurts my eyes when I put it on. I only with it was an SPF 50. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Hydrating without being sticky
reviews.comments: Complimentary from elemis. I really love the night version of this cream and the day time version is equally good! It is hydrating without being sticky and I love that there is SPF in it. While it is expensive, a little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: Been using gifted by Elemis their Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 for 2 weeks. My combo skin loves it - lightweight, no white cast, no grease! Glowy, smooth skin + SPF protection = win-win. Staying protected and pampered all summer long. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Would repurchase
reviews.comments: Gifted by elemis their Pro-Collagen Marine Cream w/ SPF 30! I loved how soft and hydrated my skin felt. Non greasy, and smells really good! I really like the texture. Very smooth and silky! Will continue to use

reviews.headline: definitely try
reviews.comments: this is a cream i have seen a lot on my tiktok and have always been interested. love the way it hydrates my skin but also protects with the spf would definitely recommend to anyone interested. gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Elemis. I love this product because it finally made my skin as hydrated as it can be. My skin looks healthier and i love it because it also isn't sticky or greasy. My new favorite product.

reviews.headline: I love this product!!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Elemis to test out, and I've been genuinely impressed. It left my skin feeling incredibly soft and deeply hydrated. I'm already planning to repurchase it! Even my husband gave it a try‚Äîand now he's hooked, using it every night because he loves the way it makes his skin feel.

reviews.headline: My Skin Loves This!
reviews.comments:
Complimentary from Elemis:

I've been using the Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 for two weeks, and it's already earned a permanent spot in my morning routine. I have somewhat sensitive skin, and this cream has been a dream‚Äîno irritation, no redness, just calm, hydrated skin that feels supported and protected.

The texture is silky and lightweight, almost like a gel-cream hybrid. It glides on effortlessly and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling smooth and plump without any greasiness. The scent is soft and spa-like‚Äîsubtle enough to feel luxurious without overwhelming.

I love that it includes SPF 30, so I get sun protection without having to layer on a separate sunscreen. It wears beautifully under makeup and doesn't pill or interfere with other products in my routine. My skin looks more radiant and just feels better overall - healthier - younger-looking!

The packaging feels luxe, and a little goes a long way‚ÄîI use a pea-sized amount and it covers my entire face and neck. This cream truly delivers on its promises! I highly recommend it!!

reviews.headline: Great for the summer
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Elemis. First of all this cream is amazing. I love that it has spf in it makes it easier to remember to apply spf when I leave the house. It also feel light weight but refreshing. I feel like it's worth it and would recommend it!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: This cream is great! It's light but feels rich and smooth on my skin and applies quickly. I love that it keeps my skin soft and hydrated. The smell is amazing, and a little goes a long way! A must have! Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This Elemis pro collagen marine cream with spf 30 was gifted by Elemis for reviewing purposes. This works really well for my dry skin and does not pill under makeup. It also does not burn around my eyes.

reviews.headline: Great formula
reviews.comments: I'm a huge fan of the original marine cream and I'm glad it's now available with spf. The formula feels similar to the regular version, light and moisturizing, and fortunately the added spf doesn't leave a white cast on my tan skin. Gifted by Elemis for review

faceoff_positive.comments: Gifted by Elemis in exchange for my honest review. I love the fresh and clean scent this cream has. The texture is a whipped cream the smoothly glides onto your skin hydrating and moisturizing it. I love how this cream works for all skin types. With it being summer it already having spf 30 is a win to keep my skin from burning. It improves the skin with firmness and elasticity leaving the skin with a rejuvenated complexion. It 14 days it has been studied and proved to reduce wrinkles and fine lines. It has natural ingredients like Ginkgo Biloba which helps protect the skin from stressors. It also has Chlorella that helps with firmness. Also Padina Pavonica which helps with hydration.
faceoff_positive.headline: Must have natural skin cream

faceoff_negative.comments: Worst Customer service ever !!! I got the wrong  item , i called more than 10 times and they dont want to fix their mistake. TERRIBLE COMPANY  DO NOT BUY.
faceoff_negative.headline: TERRIBLE COMPANY AND CUSTOMER SERVICE.
